title: Blended Learning Course on Child Protection Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic child protection policies and relevant regulations
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive project-based course conducted in a BYOD environment, focusing on strengthening practical competencies for administrators in leadership roles to analyze and implement child protection cases.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply at least three domestic/international laws and corporate policies related to child protection
Learners can creatively resolve child protection crisis intervention scenarios through team-based projects
Learners enhance practical judgment skills and reflective practice capabilities through role-playing and feedback sessions
Learners can propose improvements to child protection processes using digital collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
